unnormalised: Hey, does anyone know the current USD to INR rate? I'm planning to send some money back home to my family in Kerala. Last time I checked, it was around ₹83 per $1, but that was like, 2 weeks ago. Also, anyone know if there are any extra charges apart from the exchange rate when using services like Western Union or Remitly to convert USD to INR? My cousin said he got a better rate through some local money changer, something like ₹83.5 per $1, but I'm a bit wary of those.
normalised: Hey, does anyone know the current U-S-D to I-N-R rate? I'm planning to send some money back home to my family in Kerala. Last time I checked, it was around rupee eighty three per dollar one, but that was like, two weeks ago. Also, anyone know if there are any extra charges apart from the exchange rate when using services like Western Union or Remitly to convert U-S-D to I-N-R? My cousin said he got a better rate through some local money changer, something like rupee eighty three point five per dollar one, but I'm a bit wary of those.
